Edvard Grieg

Three Pieces, EG 105

1860

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 9'

  • 1. Allegro agitato
  • 2. Allegretto
  • 3. Allegro molto e vivace, quasi presto

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · IV/20 · Addenda et corrigenda · ed. Rune Andersen / Finn Benestad / Klaus Henning Oelmann
  • Peters · EP 3100d · Piano Works / IV / Miscellaneous Works

1. Allegro agitato

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Allegretto

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

3. Allegro molto e vivace, quasi presto

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
